VERIFICATION OF GRADUATES

1\. By QR Code

###### You can simply scan the QR code on the certificate to check the authenticity of the graduates.

![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/scan-qr-di-sijil.png)

2\. By Portal Link

FOR JAN 2024 GRADUATES ONWARDS
------------------------------

[https://bsea.utm.my/verification](https://bsea.utm.my/verification)

How it works?

1\. Click the button link

2\. Enter QR ID Number

![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/bsea.utm_.my_.png "bsea.utm_.my_")

3\. You can find the certificate’s ID below the QR code on the certificate

![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/qr-code-sijil.png "qr-code-sijil")

4\. The result of the finding will be shown if the certificate is genuine

![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/blockchain-verify.png "blockchain-verify")

FOR OCT 2012 - DEC 2023 GRADUATES
---------------------------------

[http://imbas.my/Verify.aspx](http://imbas.my/Verify.aspx)

How it works?

1\. Click the button link

2\. Choose “Graduate ID”

![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/graduate-id-button.png "graduate-id-button")

3\. Find the certificate’s graduate below the QR code on the certificate. Example: 2020M-xxxxxx (some certificate has a “space” between the number. please check carefully)

![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/qr-code-sijil.png "qr-code-sijil")

4\. The result of the finding will be shown if the certificate is genuine.

![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/result-imbas.png "result-imbas")

Need a verification letter? Click the button below

[VERIFICATION LETTER APPLICATION](https://amd.utm.my/verification-of-graduate-letter-application/)
